website_summaries.verdict: Sour cream and onion is a perennial favorite among potato chip devotees, and the Popchip version does not disappoint.
pros: The onion salt flavoring definitely shines through
Great choice as a side dish or even as a casserole topping
The sour cream seasoning reduces the need for additional dip
cons: Some traditional sour cream and onion potato chip fans may find the Popchip version to pack less flavor

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I was recently put on a strict diet due to stomach issues. Found these and read how they are just pure potatoes with no added crap like regular chips. My favorites were always the sour cream and onion ruffles. Decided to try these and they were delicious! Like, yum! And you can def taste that its pure potato. I also love that each bag is only 100 cals so no guilt. I now keep these in my office and bedroom for when I need a snack. I def plan on trying out their other flavors and these are now my go-to chips!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: ONE WORD - ADDICTIVE  IF you like salt and vinegar chips, HARD to stop at one bag!
customer_reviews.text: I TRY to eat healthier. I am not one who can just stop at a BITE of ice cream, a few chips. PROS: MUCH LOWER IN FAT, BETTER FOR YOU CRUNCH!! LOVE HOW CRUNCHY these are, they satisfy crunchy salty cravings TASTE - I LOVE salt and vinegar chips. I love these more than REGULAR OR KETTLE SALT AND VINEGAR! VERSATILE - I crumble on top of things like quinoa, brown rice and lentils for some crunch. Great inside sandwiches for a satisfying mix of textures and the salt and vinegar give sandwiches a better taste. CONS: If there is a con, it's STOPPING at one bag!
customer_reviews.author: pleineluneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: These are a great snack for when you're on the go. They are popped so there's no grease. The flavoring is delicious and every chip seems to have plenty of seasoning. Sometimes you get other brands of chips and some have plenty of seasoning and some have barely any. That's not the case with these chips. I like that they are a healthy snack. I tend to snack too much and these have really helped me cut my calories and I've lost some weight too. Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Kari & Kevin

customer_reviews.title: not greasy good flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love salt and vinegar chips and these have a great flavor that isn't too harsh or too light. The chips do get stuck in my teeth a bit but then most chips do that and unlike normal chips these don't have a greasy feeling to them
customer_reviews.author: Freya

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I order these often and really love the salt and vinegar flavor! I give them away at work and everyone loves them. The last batch I got was very disappointing. Every bag I’ve opened have been over baked, hard and taste like they’ve been burnt. These are usually very good so I’m hoping that the bags I opened were just a very small percent from a bad batch and not the whole box. Not sure I’ll buy these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: SWRW

customer_reviews.title: Check the box!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed with this purchase. I paid extra for a box of the BBQ chips only. When I got it I opened one side so I could pull a bag of chips as I wanted them. Therefore, I didn’t notice until I had to open it all the way that it’s an assortment. Of course, I’ve eaten all the barbecue chips, so I can’t return it. Total ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: JCB1

customer_reviews.title: ONLY ONE TINY PACK CAME!
customer_reviews.text: One pack of chips came---not 24 packs! Only one tiny bag for $21. Where are the other 23 packs?
customer_reviews.author: Covey

customer_reviews.title: Awful Salt and Vinegar chips
customer_reviews.text: My family loves the sea salt, barbeque and sour cream & onion varieties of Pop Chips but these salt and vinegar chips were simply awful! They were bitter to the point of being inedible. I will never rebuy this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: I am an addict!  Can we lower the price a little though?
customer_reviews.text: I love Popchips! I wish they were not so expensive, but I am an addict. Only 3 WW smart points for the 0.8 oz bag (individual serving bag). It is a go to snack for me for sure! Cheddar Sour Cream is good too. Want to try other flavors too....like chili cheese!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly strong af
customer_reviews.text: If you like your salt and vinegar chips as salty and vigarie as I do, you will appreciate these! I have searched and tried a ton of different ones, cape cod little vickies, etc etc, poor brother is the only one that is strong af, like these. And you can never find poor brother, always gone. I’d highly recommend these to those looking for that strong af salt & vinegar flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Burned popped chips
customer_reviews.text: The chips were delivered as expected however all the bags of chips in the box were burned and over cooked... I am not sure why this has happened but I buy popped chips all the time and never got them like this nor and consistently over cooked and burned as these are. Made me think they are Buying these chips and a discount messed up and selling them at regular price
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Variety Pack not just BBQ Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it was all BBQ Pop Chips and it’s still variety pack. If you like Sour Cream and Onion and Salt n Vinegar as well, then no problem. If you’re looking for just BBQ. This isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Shauneil Snell

customer_reviews.title: Healthy chip option
customer_reviews.text: My husbands favorite chips. He likes these smaller sized bags for his lunch. I find the BBQ a little too spicy/tangy but he loves it
customer_reviews.author: MDubs

customer_reviews.title: The best BBQ chip out there
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best BBQ chip ive ever had and ive tried alot of them. Most of the popchips are great but this one is amazing. If you like BBQ chips you gotta try these but be warned they are super additive they are that good.
customer_reviews.author: Matts reviews

customer_reviews.title: Hubby likes, 100 cal.  Grandkids like Lays barbeque better
customer_reviews.text: Hubby likes these. Wishes there were a little more in a package. Grandkids think it's a little to spice so try to Lays barbeque for them. Low cal, will buy again for hubby.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma fred

customer_reviews.title: Sour Power
customer_reviews.text: Ohmygosh these are really sour. You really have to LOVE vinegar to enjoy these. I don’t and now I have to give away an entire box of these - I only found one person who liked these. Salty? Yes. Enjoyable? Not at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and ordered the BBQ and the Original flavors when they were on sale in the Gold Box the other day....WOW!! These are sooo good!! Even my husband really impressed by these. The BBQ is very flavorful, and the Original is really close to a potato chip (without the nasty oil hands). I have eaten the Special K Cracker Chips before and those are okay but these babies blow them out of the water!! I was most surprised by the texture. They are crispy, and crunchy like a chip but there is no weird aftertaste or anything. I guess I will probably be getting these on subscribe and save now.
customer_reviews.author: JensaB

customer_reviews.title: Got the wrong order and can't contact the company
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 24 of only BBQ chips. (Because I REALLY deslike sea salt). I got in the mail: 8 BBQ, 8 sea salt, 4 sea salt & vinegar, and 4 sour cream and onion. I'm very unhappy and can't find a way to contact the company.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi T.

customer_reviews.title: Sour tasting
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like these at all. I was hoping for a spicy flavor, but they taste sour. Fortunately my mom can stomach them, so I won't have to throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Cailyn

customer_reviews.title: BBQ chips
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t even down one chip. Tossed them! Didn’t read list of ingredients but did not taste like bbq chips at all in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: all vinegar no salt
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I had a different brand of Salt and Vinegar crisps first... If this was my first taste I'd hate it!
customer_reviews.author: Wynter

customer_reviews.title: Very good only 3 WW points per bag
customer_reviews.text: I have had these before and they’re very good. I really wanted to try the pop chips crazy hot flavor but they are out of their mind with the price they want 50+ dollars for the same thing I paid for $21 for the pop chips sour cream n onion
customer_reviews.author: Denise Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and low calorie snack that arrived next day and had a good expiration date. Second order and no complaints. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: E Grill 1 of 2

customer_reviews.title: Great snack and best flavor
customer_reviews.text: BBQ is the best flavor (IMHO). The chips are not broken when the arrive. The portion size is the same as you would purchase in a single serving retail package.
customer_reviews.author: Marc O

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and tasty
customer_reviews.text: I was first introduced to these chips at work. My job is attempting to do a wellness initiative. They sought out snack items that where low in calories and other nonessentials but full of taste. Everyone love these chips and I love them enough to go out on Amazon and purchase them as a healthy snack options. I would highly recommend it to all of you who love to snack on chips. I don’t think he will be disappointed. Be sure to try some of the other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Reba T. Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Wrong flavor sent
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted the BBQ but received Salt and Vinegar in error. My husband will not eat them, but since the expiry date is not until Jun 2020, I will give them a try. Not sure whether to try ordering again...
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Best Flavor Popchips
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips so much and I am so happy I was able to find them in this size packaging in bulk. I can never find the salt and vinegar flavor in the small bags where I live, so thank goodness for Amazon! They are so easy to grab and go for a lunch side or a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty. Healthy. Delicious.
customer_reviews.text: Yummy healthy chips! They have a good crunch and have a little quick of spice to them. Will keep buying! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Molina

customer_reviews.title: Love this Chips
customer_reviews.text: I got this in a party box. Then I just had to have one for myself. I love this chips. Great Portion control.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Snyder

customer_reviews.title: No Thank You to Food Additives
customer_reviews.text: Has additives maltodextrin, citric acid, and natural flavor. Taste fine, but planning to avoid foods with unknown additive sources that could have MSG.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor, packets are big enough but not too big. Boys love these to munch on.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Hot but diet!
customer_reviews.text: Excellant if you are trying to watch your weight. Spicy but not too much.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Only barbecue chips are good
customer_reviews.text: My last delivery was incorrect. I wanted All barbecue chips. No other variety.
customer_reviews.author: Foster

customer_reviews.title: Major buyer's regret
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely disgusting. The worst "chip"/"snack food" I've ever eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Anna T

customer_reviews.title: Not very tasty
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed in these chips. Had to end up throwing almost of entire box away. AWFUL
customer_reviews.author: Lee Miller

customer_reviews.title: BOMB
customer_reviews.text: I loveee the flavor and crunch of these chips. They are so good. I love hot cheetos but wanted a more healthy alternative and I enjoy these. However, each bag is 90 calories so there is a ton of just air in the bag with not very many chips which suck. But I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerisa Riva

customer_reviews.title: I love these, but received cardboard flavor :(
customer_reviews.text: I love salt and vinegar chips and I love how these come in small low calorie packs. I get these all the time at the grocery store. However, the ones I received taste like cardboard and I literally mean cardboard. It's like the smell of the cardboard box they came in permeated the bags and made the chips taste funky. Salt and Vinegar cardboard chips :(
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Very good for a healthy alternative.
customer_reviews.text: I love potato chips, but they are so unhealthy. The popchips have great BBQ flavor, and while the texture is different, it is still good. BBQ Flavor: 5/5 Chip Flavor: 4/5 Chip Texture: 4/5 And at half the calories of BBQ lays potato chips, and plenty of chips in the bag. I haven't tried any of the other flavors yet, but it seems to be like it would really be hard to go wrong with this alternative to the normally fried potato chips.
customer_reviews.author: Hostage67

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips. Great taste and flavor. Will definitely be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Taste great and not too spicy & much healthier than regular chips!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great salt fix
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little snack for when I need a low cal salt fix.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shankman

customer_reviews.title: Crispy and Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I really love the salt and vinegar flavor of Popchips. I don't miss oily chips when I eat this flavor. It's satisfying and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria B

customer_reviews.title: Arrives fast, packaged great, good value
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious. Not too salty with a lot of potato flavor. More of a baked potato flavor
customer_reviews.author: LJY

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: Flavor could be more intense but these things got me into salt & vinegar chips!
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: As far as diet foods go, it's definitely 5 star!
customer_reviews.text: We received a sampler package from Amazon that had several flavors....cheddar, bbq, sour cream/onion, plain, salt and pepper, and also the salt and vinegar. I've already received our first shipment of just the vinegar version. These are a good salty fix without the calories...and each proportioned pouch is satisfying in one sitting. I would've liked to try the garlic parm but it wasn't included. Our #1 is salt and vinegar and #2 would probably be the salt and pepper.
customer_reviews.author: J. Withers

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ Flavor, Crispy, 100 cals
customer_reviews.text: Tasty and flavorful little crunchy light snack, only 100 calories for the bag. Satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Siberianpeachpie

customer_reviews.title: Ugh
customer_reviews.text: I got the WRONG flavor of chips TWICE. Amazing said they were afraid if I tried to order the product again it would still be wrong so they just gave me my money back. I love these chips and can’t find them anywhere so I wanted the right flavor...what kind of customer service is that........come on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get the order right!
customer_reviews.text: This was to replace my first order as it was a box of variety not a full box of BBQ chips! And this box was the same!
customer_reviews.author: ipad reader

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I have to toss the entire box of popchips. The taste of vinegar is so powerful that you can't taste anything else. I order everything I can from Amazon but I amvery disappointed about the chips
customer_reviews.author: Majar

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Hot is the Best Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Crazy Hot has always been my favorite flavored Popchips. If you love spicy chips, you won’t be disappointed. Plus, they are only 90 calories per (single serving) bag.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Harris

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: I used to eat these as a snack after workouts when I went to smoothie king but they were so good I just had to get them to be able to eat them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ames

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chips
customer_reviews.text: Great chips that are healthier than most chips while having a great taste. I will be ordering more today.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Hallman

customer_reviews.title: The Best Treat Ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a sandwich shop to go along with my sandwich and I took the empty bag home to find them on Amazon....they are crisp and full of flavor and never broken and no crumbs in the bag like potatoe chips. If I remember correctly without running downstairs to look at the bag they are 100-120 calories for the bag. Love them! We have them on auto ship! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Gloria J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Light and delicious
customer_reviews.text: These are little airy and delicious nuggets of goodness...except of course, they aren't nuggets, lol. Really though, these chips are nice and crunchy while also being light and airy. The salt and vinegar flavor is just right...not too strong, but never lacking. Actually, my only real complaint is that i find it difficult to stop eating them. However, that is simply my cross to bear. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Faden

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and great!
customer_reviews.text: Healthy at its best! Every bite has an amazing BBQ taste and great crisp. This is a healthy snack the whole family enjoys eating.
customer_reviews.author: Vivyn

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered these for years and the last two cases we have received has tasted stale and awful and has a weird grass like flavor. We used to love these chips but there is something wrong with the flavor tasting stale so we won’t be purchasing them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste in the salt and vinegar sones.!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the taste of this product. I have eaten salt & vinegar potato chips and Ritz Crisp Thins also in salt & vinegar. I have always loved them. Wasted $20+ dollars. I should have tried to find only 1 bag to try them.
customer_reviews.author: leon kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Favorite "not to fattening" chip. I love it with homemade kefir cheese (that has Italian seasoning in it). They go well with it.
customer_reviews.author: K433Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: If you like sour chips
customer_reviews.text: They are extra sour not at all what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lukky

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Love these things when I want a salty snack on the go, but don't want the temptation of a larger bag (since I would probably just eat the whole bag at home in one sitting). The BBQ flavor is tasty and the chips arrived in tact to a satisfactory degree. Only gripe is how few there are in each bag, but that's probably for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and crunch.  Not like other diet chips.
customer_reviews.text: Only 100 calories per bag. My favorite low calorie chips!
customer_reviews.author: Aewhitavb

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying more
customer_reviews.text: Super delicious, great if you're counting macros. I enjoy mine alongside a sandwich or hamburger! It's like a healthier rice cracker and the flavor is delicious! will be purchasing these again!
customer_reviews.author: Mikk

customer_reviews.title: These are the best chips ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these chips. All the flavors are great, but my favorites are Plain, Cheddar and Sour Cream & Onion. I started eating them when I was trying to lose weight, and now that I lost the weight, I continue to eat them because the taste so great -- much better than greasy potato chips and more flavorful than baked chips. I love the portion control size. Keep up the great work PopChips!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austin

customer_reviews.title: Ties as favorite Pop Chip Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Ties as favorite of the Popchip flavors! I love this one and Cheddar/Sour Cream. Yummy! I like how light and airy they are vs a traditional potato chip. Yes they are still loaded with a ton of ingredients, but they are a softer healthier alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Prince

customer_reviews.title: Tasty snack
customer_reviews.text: If you like eating chips but don't like eating all the calories and saturated fat that go along with it, these are a good alternative. They take a little getting used to because the texture is not the same as a normal potato chip, but I really enjoy the barbecue flavored ones. They have a sweet barbecue flavor without being oily and too bad for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great crunchy BBQ chip...
customer_reviews.text: Not quite an ounce...100 calories...great taste and texture...huge fan of BBQ chips but this stands in quite nicely. Trick will be to stop at one bag. Highly recommend them...as well as Pirates Booty and Vita Tops...trifecta of snacks that go great with my mission to eat healthy. Now if they could only make a great substitute for peanut M & M's. Maybe it's better that they don't.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu & Ernestines Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors but crushed
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips but they were shipped in a box with a 25 pound bag of dog food, so the chips were crushed
customer_reviews.author: Pam Thompson

customer_reviews.title: what? a tasty AND healthy snack, you say?
customer_reviews.text: These chips are a super tasty snack! I'm just getting into a lifestyle where I try to be mindful of what I put in my body. I love normal salt and vinegar chips and these are a very satisfying alternative. Really good price for how much a received and one small individual bag is plenty for me.
customer_reviews.author: andrea callender

customer_reviews.title: Delicious quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love this flavor. The shipping was pretty quick. I don’t feel as guilty eating these chips because they have much less calories than most.
customer_reviews.author: thtbeauty

customer_reviews.title: Delicious alternative
customer_reviews.text: These are so good. Great healthier alternative to regular potato chips.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Chips
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips. I could eat them every day. They are the perfect healthy little snack. The taste is phenomenal, better than any baked chip out there. I enjoy them more than regular chips and there is absolutely no guilt in enjoying them. The barbeque is my favorite. It's amazing how many chips fit into this bag and is still considered to be a single serving.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Delicious healthy chips
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a variety case of Popchips with 11 different flavors. My wife made me buy another case of Salt and Vinegar because she loved them so much. They are light and crispy with a ton of flavor. They taste much better than baked chips. I bought them because they were healthy snacks, but now I keep buying them because my whole family loves them.
customer_reviews.author: John Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Sooo good
customer_reviews.text: These chips are sooo good. Perfect portion size and are delicious
customer_reviews.author: Erika Clemens

customer_reviews.title: yum!
customer_reviews.text: We love the BBQ Popchips in our house and reorder as soon as the current box is getting low. The other flavors are good too but BBQ is a favorite in our house! We have these on sandwich night when we make our own toasted subs/sandwiches. The kids also take a bag to school for lunch sometimes when they don't care for the hot lunch menu.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Gteat Chips
customer_reviews.text: Ilike these cuos. They are not fried or baked, but popped.
customer_reviews.author: a beauty customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price per bag
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. Good price per bag. I was stopping and buying them from a vending machine. Glad I can now get them through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tarah

customer_reviews.title: Tasty chips!
customer_reviews.text: BBQ Popchips are my favorite! I like that these are already packaged into individual serving sizes, because when I open a bag, it's SOOOOOOOO hard for me to stop eating them! Great package size to pack in lunches, and much healthier than buying baked or fried chips. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: kjmwv

customer_reviews.title: 100 Calorie Snack
customer_reviews.text: In my eyes Pop Chips are an acceptable snack. I watch my weight and exercise daily but still get a yen for chips once in a while. These pop chips fill the bill. They are a good 100 calorie snack and although I don't eat them everyday when I am scouring the cupboards looking for a salty snack these work and fit into my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Delivery is great and product is great too
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding bbq flavor in the store so I decided to just order them! Delivery is great and product is great too!
customer_reviews.author: TexasKB

customer_reviews.title: Very crispy & flavorful!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of flavor & crunchy. Love these & buy them often. Always happy with them. Great snack!
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Great pop
customer_reviews.text: I love salt and vinegar chips and this product is a great alternative
customer_reviews.author: Allison J. Godden

customer_reviews.title: Popchips! My favs!
customer_reviews.text: I love Popchips! For only 100 calories, I can satisfy my chip and salt cravings. Much better than fried regular chips.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. Siau

customer_reviews.title: Wow....these are great!
customer_reviews.text: Good things do come in small packages! These are so tasty and after being diagnosed with type 2 diabetes, it's tough finding healthy snacks. Thankfully, amazon.com sends me a Gold Box daily special and that's how I happened upon these! Will be buying more, my husband can't tell they are popchips and not fried or baked.
customer_reviews.author: Happy CookerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: NO BBQ IN MY ORDER
customer_reviews.text: NOT ONE BAG OF BBQ CHIPS IN THIS CASE!!!!! ALL STALE SOUR CREAM AND ONION CHIPS. I'LL NEVER ORDER FROM THEM AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Mela

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I really like the BBQ POP-CHIPS. BUT this Item description stated BBQ per 24. I expected 24 BBQ, I received a variety pack. I could have gotten a better price/ value from other sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth P Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Awsome bag of chips!!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, nice to have a healthy serving instead of half of a bag every time!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mike merriner

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful
customer_reviews.text: Could not find anywhere locally so ordered these online. Most flavorful snack I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: BBQ POPCHIP HEAVEN
customer_reviews.text: Wow - I am totally addicted to these. In my opinion, they BBQ flavoring is really good and these are very crunchy. It does not taste like these should be healthy for you. I would rather eat these BBQ chips than any other chips and I love all kinds of chips. I have now switch over to POPCHIPS as I know I am eating a better chip and its healther too. For 100 calories and around 3 grams of fat, I feel it is a good choice and the taste makes it worth wild. I have taken some of these to work and have gotten some co-workers hooked on these as well.
customer_reviews.author: GROUCHHUNTER

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Indulging
customer_reviews.text: These cute little circles crunch and taste so, so, so good! I always remind myself that I'm eating a low-fat, baked good-for-my-health snack or part of a meal because the truth is they're sinfully good. I like them best when I just nibble at the edges and draw the experience out for as long as I can. But they're good just chomped down, too.
customer_reviews.author: Dorrie

customer_reviews.title: The first order of chips were fresh and packed well ...
customer_reviews.text: The first order of chips were fresh and packed well. The second order I placed the chips didn’t taste as fresh. However easier than counting the chips for WW, so bags are easier. Not sure if will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JDA

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great! You would never know they are not fried and they don't have that bland taste like baked chips do. I must say though, this is the only flavor I care for. I bought the multi pack, and I just don't care for the rest. The sea salt and vinegar is downright horrible, the rest are tolerable I guess.BUT, the barbecue ones rock!!
customer_reviews.author: LoveToShop

customer_reviews.title: Pop Chips - Sea Salt & Vinegar
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak for the other flavors but the sea salt & vinegar is freaking amazing!!! I LOVE these chips. I keep them in stock & I don't share, that's how yummy they are!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KaydeeKay

customer_reviews.title: Great way to snack for 100 calories per bag.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are prefect to snack on and only 100 calories per bag. I have a tough time trying to limit myself to a serving size, so being able to buy a perfectly portioned bag is great for me. I eat the whole bag with no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Even my hubby, who sticks his nose up at anything kind of good for you.....is HOOKED! When you are trying to WATCH it, these are a nice addition to a sandwich, pita, instead of grabbing the chips! They are just delicious. The small bag keeps things in control too! Great taste and oh so convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Robin M. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and low calories
customer_reviews.text: In comparison to other chips, Popchips are definitely healthier and the flavor of the sea salt & vinegar is well worth it (get the same great taste of the fatty chips without having to worry). Yes, I would definitely recommend the popchips version of salt & vinegar (as well as sweet potato)!
customer_reviews.author: SmartwareDesign(dot)com

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Flavor Sent
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeee popchips as a healthy alternative to regular chips. The sea salt & vinegar flavor is my favorite and would absolutely get 5 stars, but I ordered a huge box of them and got sent sour cream and onion instead by mistake :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Substitute
customer_reviews.text: I love salt and vinegar chips, and when I found these in the store, I tried these and thought they were a great "healthier" substitute. They have a nice crunch and flavor, but I think that 24 bags was overkill for me, since I am the only one in my home! Will buy them again....just not 24 bags at a time!
customer_reviews.author: RLP

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these chips! Everyone comes over to get a bag. It's hard to keep them in stock! Great job Amazon! 😄
customer_reviews.author: Worldpeace

customer_reviews.title: Family favorite! Way cheaper to buy in bulk!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves these chip. I like the individual sized ones so no overeating or need to package ahead of time. They sell these at stores like Costco in individual sized packages but they are mixed flavors. My family's favorite is the bar b que so we order off Amazon to get exactly what we want.
customer_reviews.author: wpappy

customer_reviews.title: gross
customer_reviews.text: sooooo nasty. literally no words for how nasty they are 🤢
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

product_meta.title: Popchips Potato Chips, Sour Cream and Onion, 0.8 Ounce (Pack of 24)
product_meta.description:
Style:Potato Chips| Flavor Name:Sour Cream and Onion| Size:0.8 Ounce (Pack of 24)We believe in the freedom to snack. That’ s why we created a new chip. One that’ s deeply satisfying but never deep fried. So you can feel free to eat one, two, three handfuls, or even a whole bag. and why not? it’ s okay, they’ re popchips! Crunchy and flavorful, popchips are simply potatoes, popped to perfection. We take potatoes, add heat & pressure then pop! You get chips that give you more for your taste buds, with fewer calories & more chips per serving than other fried or baked chips. popchips are gluten free, kosher, contain no trans fat, no added preservatives, no fake flavors and no synthetic colors. Select flavors non-GMO and vegan.

AMAZON.COM
Popchips Potato Chips, Sour Cream and Onion
feature_bullets: A PERFECT MATCH. On their own, sour cream is tangy and onion is savory and slightly sweet. but together, they’re a power couple – sour cream & onion popchips are a taste sensation of delicious togetherness. Contains 24, 0.8oz. bags.

STOCK UP! A single chip is never enough to satisfy your natural craving for a crunchy snack. So do the sensible thing: stock up your pantry with a multi-pack or variety pack of popchips so you're ready for a crowd.
GET MORE FOR YOUR TASTEBUDS. since popchips are not deep fried, you get more chips per serving, with all the flavor but half the fat and fewer calories compared to leading fried potato chip brands.
CRUNCHY AND FLAVORFUL. popchips are simply potatoes, popped to perfection. We take potatoes, add heat & pressure then pop! You get chips that are deeply satisfying, never deep fried.

FEEL THE LOVE IN EVERY BITE. With sour cream & onion popchips, you get fewer calories & more chips per serving than other fried or baked chips. 100 calories/serving. Gluten free. Nothing artificial. No cholesterol. Kosher. No trans or saturated fat.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
